keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support one-to-one tuition for every child that needs it.
Expand upon the four Sure Start Centres in Hertford and Stortford.
Support Labour's planned National Care Service.
Continue to invest in high profile policing.

issues.health: Labour has invested record sums in your NHS. The new Hertford County hospital continues to expand its services and now includes a GP out-of-hours service and an urgent care centre.

housing.content: As a first time house buyer, I need low interest rates and job security. The Tories would put the economy at risk.

contactInformation.address: Hertford & Stortford Labour Party, PO Box 6984, Bishop's Stortford, Hertfordshire, CM23 3NZ.

endorsements.endorsement: As a first time house buyer, I need low interest rates and job security. The Tories would put the economy at risk.

images.caption: Labour working with locals on road safety in Canons Close.
Labour's commitment to Hertford Regional College and providing first-class facilities.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Don't let the Tories ruin your NHS. Labour, working with local residents, won investment to improve road safety in Canons Close. Labour are working hard to protect local businesses and services. Don't let the Tories put it at risk. Labour's money has rebuilt Hertford Regional College and provided first-class facilities.
